<<<<<<< HEAD
Sermons preached upon several occasions by Robert South ... Sermons. Selections South, Robert, 1634-1716.
[22], 300 p.
Printed by H. Hall for Ric. Davis and VVill. Nott, Oxford : 1679.
"A sermon upon the 7. Iohn 17," has special t.p., dated 1679; each of the remaining sermons has special t.p., with date 1678. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. Interest deposed and trvth restored -- Ecclesiasticall policy the best policy, or, Religion the best reason of state -- A sermon preached at the Cathedral Church of St. Paul, Novemb. 9, 1662 -- A sermon preached before the covrt at Christ-Church Chappel in Oxford -- A sermon preached at Lambeth-Chappel on the 25th of November vpon the consecration of the Right Reverend Father in God Dr Iohn Dolben, Lord Bishop of Rochester -- A sermon upon the 7. Iohn 17.
=======
Sermons preached upon several occasions by Robert South ... Sermons. Selections South, Robert, 1634-1716.
[22], 300 p.
Printed by H. Hall for Ric. Davis and VVill. Nott, Oxford : 1679.
"A sermon upon the 7. Iohn 17," has special t.p., dated 1679; each of the remaining sermons has special t.p., with date 1678. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. Interest deposed and trvth restored -- Ecclesiasticall policy the best policy, or, Religion the best reason of state -- A sermon preached at the Cathedral Church of St. Paul, Novemb. 9, 1662 -- A sermon preached before the covrt at Christ-Church Chappel in Oxford -- A sermon preached at Lambeth-Chappel on the 25th of November vpon the consecration of the Right Reverend Father in God Dr Iohn Dolben, Lord Bishop of Rochester -- A sermon upon the 7. Iohn 17.
Ric. Davis
VVill. Nott
H. Hall
